name: Vital Monster: Magical Battle
description:
Discover the true story of the Vital Monsters on www.vitalmonster.com

Create, level up, and evolve adorable Vital Monsters! Gather meteorite fragments by defeating the evil Noxomonster that will harm your health, and use these powerful fragments to create more Vital Monsters in the reactor. Vital Monster is a unique, fun, and completely addicting monster collecting game. The design is reminiscent of classic RPG games that are so much fun to play. Now you don’t need a console to enjoy a fun, monster collecting game. Just download this game to your iPhone and play!

Storyline: You arrived to granny for the summer vacation, when you encounter a pot monster. He is telling you a story about Vital Monsters and Noxomonsters. Vital Monsters are important source of health for the world and Noxomonsters are evil creatures that will harm your health. Now you must defeat the Noxomonsters, gather powerful meteorite fragments, and use them to create and evolve new Vital Monsters. It’s a very interesting and fun mission. Why not try it now?

How to play: The pot monster will teach you how to play and battle with a Noxomonster on the forest. Basically, you need to tap on falling crystals on the battle to reveal the items they have. You must tap on the healthy food items such as tomatoes, blueberries, lemons, and peas. These items are useful to help you attack, defend, or restore your health during the fight. You win when the Noxomonster loses all its health. Then you can gather the fragments and use them to create Vital Monsters in the reactor.

FEATURES OF VITAL MONSTERS - MAGICAL BATTLE:

Download and play our monster collecting game for FREE!

Adorable, colorful, but high quality 2D classic style graphic.
Many cute vital monsters to collect and evolve into more powerful creatures.
Engaging storyline and interesting game concept.
Instead of battling and capturing your pets, you create them.
Fun battle with enemies.
Complete quests after quests to get rewards.
Unlock Achievements
Unique gameplay and story unlike other capture pet games.
There is always something NEW to discover. You will never get bored!

There are so many things in this game that will make you fall in love in the first few minutes. We will tell you the story about Vital Monster and the obnoxious Noxomonster through the cute pot monster. Then we will teach you how to battle Noxomonster and how to win. Afterward, you can use the fragments to create more Vital pets, level up, and evolve them to be even more powerful!

The best thing about Vital Monster is that everything is so interesting and fun. We also add a lot of surprising elements so you will always discover something new in the game. Quests are supposed to be fun!

Fruits and vegetables are good for you! Play Vital Monsters today and level up your health!

---
We hope you have as much fun as we did when we developed this game! Please support this awesome game by leaving us a great rating and review.
